command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay"); command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay"); command.substring(5).trim();

i lol’d

item.title: How do you add the ::yell command?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

[quote=“uno_da_cat, post:10, topic:253675”][quote author=Fireweaver0 link=topic=335132.msg2607474#msg2607474 date=1230596731]
Sorry but YOU did nothing uno…you weren’t willing to actually look for thus you didn’t want to help yourself

yes darklom helped you but he also SPOONFED you
[/quote]
Fireweaver0… Please… learn… To… Read… the entire topic… I said, I searched it up, and I asked for help… I didn’t tell him to post his, which doesn’t seem to work, I was just asking if theres any guides. Searching does nothing, because half the god damn topics in here are deleted anyways… So… Point learned?[/quote]

If you google the right thing, you’ll find all of the most recent, and old posts that have been posted in all the Rsps communities, Not just moparscape, that’s why i gave you that, it is not my fault if you don’t look up the right thing.

@Darklom;

This community isn’t a spoon-feeding one, And what you did was spoon-feeding,
We don’t spoon-feed people for a reason, as all of the recent moderators have said,
Most people here are currently dependant on others to give them information that has been posted hundreds of times before, it’s not hard at all just to search this information, and you will get your answer quicker than posting a topic asking for help,

Don’t start a flame war on this topic, It won’t do any good for all of you, and for the community.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you add the ::yell command?
item.dc:creator: @uno_da_cat uno_da_cat
item.description:
@uno_da_cat wrote:

[quote=“darklom, post:6, topic:253675”]Heres mine…
Put it on Client.java were all your commands are at

[code] else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && playerRights >= 0 && command.length() > 5) {

        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).trim();

        if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
        } else {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);

[/code]
Thanks si force for helping him![/quote]
Thank you for helping me, Si force did nothing…

Read full topic
item.source: How do you add the ::yell command?

item.title: How do you add the ::yell command?
item.dc:creator: @darklom darklom
item.description:
@darklom wrote:

Heres mine…
Put it on Client.java were all your commands are at

[code] else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && playerRights >= 0 && command.length() > 5) {

        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).trim();

        if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
        } else {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);

[/code]
Thanks si force for helping him…

Read full topic
